TextView.android:text: Stay in touch with friends and family
Allow people in your circles to reach you on Hangouts
We hope Hangouts makes you smile. If so, let us know!
Receive voicemail and send text messages in Hangouts.
Share device, call status, and mood
"Show friends what device you're on, if you're busy on a call, or what your mood is today"
For accurate location sharing, turn on location services
"You won't be notified of new messages"
"You'll see messages from this person, but not notifications"

TextView.android:text: For accurate location sharing, turn on location services
Hangouts now lets you text message (SMS).
Turn on SMS and see all your conversations in one app.

"Place your device on a steady surface and be sure there's no movement behind you.
Then step out of the camera's view."
When multiple people are in front of your device the camera will automatically zoom to focus on the person currently speaking.
